title: 118 Anastasia Volkova on how to monitor whole landscapes and watersheds from space
subtitle: 118 Anastasia Volkova on how to monitor whole landscapes and watersheds from space
summary:
With Anastasia Volkova, CEO of Regrow, we discuss remote sensing and how their digital platform combines agronomy and scenario planning with monitoring, reporting, and verification.
